structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COMMISSION AND CITY MANAGER FORMS OF GOVERNMENT (Superseded)

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 235, sec. 20, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 39, sec. 1. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 243, sec. 33. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 285, sec. 8. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 135, sec. 1. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 143, sec. 1. -- Amended 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 123, sec. 29. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 3235dd-27, 3235dd-28, 3480c-28, 3480c-29, 3606c-11, 3606c-12, 3606c-13.
